title: How to set up new Pixel 5 (gift for son) so that I'm the administrator
content:
I've bought my 13 year old a Pixel 5.  I'd like to make sure that I can always access the device. Is it possible for the Pixel 5 to be set up to accept two access codes or two fingerprints, instead of one?
Thanks
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 5
